MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable`1<class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Support.Models.Service> List(class Microsoft.Azure.Management.Support.IServicesOperations operations) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Function List (operations As IServicesOperations) As IEnumerable(Of Service)

Docs.param: The operations group for this extension method.
Docs.summary: Lists all the Azure services available for support ticket creation. For **Technical** issues, select the Service Id that maps to the Azure service/product as displayed in the **Services** drop-down list on the Azure portal's [New support request](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Support/HelpAndSupportBlade/overview) page. Always use the service and its corresponding problem classification(s) obtained programmatically for support ticket creation. This practice ensures that you always have the most recent set of service and problem classification Ids.

For **Technical** issues, select the Service Id that maps to the Azure service/product as displayed in the **Services** drop-down list on the Azure portal's [New support request](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Support/HelpAndSupportBlade/overview) page. Always use the service and its corresponding problem classification(s) obtained programmatically for support ticket creation. This practice ensures that you always have the most recent set of service and problem classification Ids.
